ygData.subject: Re: Re:What to buy?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It is somewhat high; however, with it on, my total weight is still under 9 stones and that includes food, drink, and several stacks of bandages. It not
ygData.messageBody:
At 03:51 PM 2/7/00 -0500, you wrote:
>
>Nothing wrong with being different. However, I would not choose to wear
>those items because of their weight. I know that the Lizzy Mantle
>weighs 2.5 which is quite a bit.
>
>--
>
>Hammeron
>Monk of Quellious
>Karana

It is somewhat high; however, with it on, my total weight is still under 9
stones and that includes food, drink, and several stacks of bandages. It not
much of a burden and it is greater by 2 AC over cured silk. I am also
sometimes
guilty of duel weilding combine warhammers (7.3 WT). Typically I group with a
warrior and a ranger along with casters, so I rarely take hits and can afford
the over 20 weight. I hope to replace them soon with Black Enamelled Maces
which will shed about six stones of weight. Nothing else on my person weighs
much more than 0.1 with the exception of a Bracer of Erolissi (1.0 WT) and a
Serpentine Bracer (0.8 WT). Rusty Spike Shoulderpads, incidentally, are also
2.5 WT and provide 3AC with +5 STR.

In Quellious's Name,

Manjushri Bodhisattva
Bearer of the Red Sash of the Ashen Order
(Fennin Ro)
